Containers.Name: Roanes Kitchen
Containers.Overview: Roane's Kitchen is a self-hosted meal planning and recipe management application. This stack includes the backend API, frontend web UI, and PostgreSQL database. Access the web interface at http://[IP]:[PORT:80]
Containers.Description:
Roane's Kitchen - Meal Planning and Recipe Management
A comprehensive meal planning system with: - Weekly meal schedule management - Recipe database with ingredients and instructions - Multi-week sequence planning - Discord notifications for meal prep reminders - Database backup and restore functionality
This is the full stack deployment. For Unraid, it's recommended to use docker-compose. See: https://github.com/plongitudes/roanes-kitchen/blob/main/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md
Containers.Requires: This template requires docker-compose for full stack deployment. Install the "Compose Manager" plugin from Community Applications first.
